definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: And getting into a top tier university is the best way to ensure a good future.
sentences.chinese: 而進入一流大學則是確保錦繡前程的最好方法。

sentences.english: You are in rare form, happy, optimistic, and ready to plan your bright future.
sentences.chinese: 你現在非常積極樂觀，準備規劃你的錦繡前程。

sentences.english: However, under an atmosphere of apartheid a bright future not have interest in him.
sentences.chinese: 然而種族隔離氛圍下的錦繡前程引不起他的興趣。
